research.title: Research & Publications
research.paper: Lead Author - "Blockchain and IoT for Healthcare: A Systematic Analysis"
research.publisher: Published in Springer's Algorithms for Intelligent Systems
points: Authored comprehensive research paper exploring blockchain integration with IoT for healthcare systems
Collaborated with healthcare technology experts to validate practical implementation strategies
Implemented complex Product Information Management (PIM) feature
Successfully deployed solution serving 50+ US clients with real-time data synchronization
Implemented Cloudflare HTTP/2 caching solutions, reducing average page load time to under 2 seconds
Successfully integrated and deployed 3 major feature releases within first month
Developed backend architecture using Node.js and Express.js with MongoDB integration
Led daily standups and sprint planning for a 9-member agile team
Delivered 4 sprint milestones on schedule while maintaining code quality standards

leadership.title: Leadership Highlight
leadership.description: Collaborated with Apple Asia Head (Ashish Chowdhary) to develop assistive technology for visually impaired children, creating an iOS app that serves as an alternative to traditional Braille tools. Project currently supports students across local schools in Chandigarh.
